subject: Lockouts
Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The union representing Major League Soccer’s game officials ratified a new collective bargaining agreement Wednesday, ending a lockout that had led the league to use replacement referees and linesmen for the first two weeks of the season.
snippet: The union representing Major League Soccer’s game officials ratified a new collective bargaining agreement Wednesday, ending a lockout that had led the league to use replacement referees and linesmen for the first two weeks of the season.
